TopicTitle: Randomly deleting parts after save. Missing on launch pad.

Articles.Content:
Windows 10

RTX 2070 Super

16GB ram 2X8

12400 Core

 

After building a ship of a higher part count and saving it random struts and fuel transfer lines disappear on the launch pad.  Multiple attempts with no rhyme or reason.

This may or may not be related but I have the exact opposite issue. I remove a part in VAB, save get to the pad, and then a should be deleted part appears and collides with the one on the pad.

Edit: This is not related, it's a debris deleting issue. A previous craft that met the kraken before liftoff left a launch clamp and some stray wings that never went away.

Edited February 28, 2023 by Telanis
Found and fixed my actual issue. Sorry, I thought mine was related but it absolutely is not.
